title: CU Wizards Endowment Fund
description: To provide support for the CU Wizards Program at the University of Colorado Boulder.
marketingContent:
The CU Wizards entertain and inform children about the wonders of science with interactive shows hosted by renowned University of Colorado professors. These shows are open to the public and are geared toward students in grades K-12 and their families, but all are welcome!

Please take a look at our website for additional information:
https://www.colorado.edu/cuwizards/
